cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP address to an invalid format '999.999.999.999' will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the IP address is malformed.

du.explanation_en: Setting the uplink frequency band to an out-of-range value of 999 will cause the gNB to fail during initialization as the value exceeds the valid band range.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行頻率帶設定為超出範圍的值 999 會導致 gNB 在初始化期間失敗，因為該值超過有效帶範圍。
